name: 代數學（一）
description: 本課程讓學生瞭解群、環、體的基本理論，以作為學生未來修習其他進階課程的基礎。
goals: 訓練學生掌握抽象代數的基本知識
訓練學生可以用代數的語言進行溝通、表達、寫作
培養學生的直覺、欣賞與應用高等代數至其他學科的能力。
syllabus:
1\. Introduction to groups (1 week)

2\. Subgroups, Lagrange's theorem (2 weeks)

3\. Normal subgroups and quotient groups (2 weeks

4\. Group homomorphisms, isomorphism theorems, and correspondence theorem (2 weeks)

5\. Cyclic groups, direct products (1 week)

Midterm exam

6\. Finite abelian groups (2 weeks)

7\. Symmetric groups (2 weeks)

8\. Group actions (1 week)

9\. p-Groups and Sylow theorems (3 weeks)

Final exam
